alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Ontario (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 21 at 9:16PM EDT until May 22 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WAYNE...LIVINGSTON...SOUTHEASTERN MONROE AND ONTARIO COUNTIES... At 915 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hemlock, or 10 miles east of Geneseo, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Canandaigua, Geneseo, East Rochester, Fairport, Dansville, Letchworth State Park, Avon, Mount Morris, Victor and Honeoye Falls. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 4 and 11. Interstate 90 between exits 45 and 43. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
